div.span: Ordered before 12h, shipped the same day

img.style: margin-left: 12px; transform: translateX(15.8%) scaleX(1.13) scaleY(1.08); animation-play-state: paused; transition: none 0s ease 0s;

section.class: s_searchbar o_colored_level o_cc o_cc2 pt48 pb48
section.style: height: 0px;background-image: none; width: 100%; background-color: white; height: 100px;

button.title: Search
button.class: btn oe_search_button btn-primary o_animate o_anim_pulse o_animate_both_scroll o_visible
button.style: height: 70%; color: black; background-color: white; border-color: rgb(206, 212, 218) rgb(206, 212, 218) rgb(206, 212, 218) white; border-radius: 0rem; border-left-width: 0px;

t.t-nocache: The wishlist may vary and depends on the user.
The number of products is dynamic, this rendering cannot be cached.

t.t-value: request.session['website_sale_cart_quantity'] if 'website_sale_cart_quantity' in request.session else website.sale_get_order().cart_quantity or 0

div.data-editor-message: DROP BUILDING BLOCKS HERE TO MAKE THEM AVAILABLE ACROSS ALL PRODUCTS

section.t-attf-class: container py-4 oe_website_sale #{'discount' if combination_info['has_discounted_price'] else ''}

p.placeholder: A short description that will also appear on documents.

input.name: csrf_token
input.t-nocache: The csrf token must always be up to date.

a.t-attf-class: btn btn-primary js_check_product a-submit flex-grow-1 #{'btn-lg' if ctaSizeBig else ''}

div.p: This product is no longer available.
This product has no valid combination.

table.t-attf-class: table table-sm text-muted {{'' if single_value_attributes else 'd-none'}}

div.class: d-flex justify-content-between flex-column flex-md-row align-items-md-end mb-3

div.data-editor-message: DROP BUILDING BLOCKS HERE TO MAKE THEM AVAILABLE ACROSS ALL PRODUCTS
